summary: Provides a comprehensive suite of unit tests that validate core functionalities of a numerical computing library, covering just-in-time compilation, forward- and reverse-mode automatic differentiation, tree manipulation utilities, shape validation, and handling of reference cycles and residual forwarding.
business_intent: Ensures the reliability and correctness of the library's core computational and transformation mechanisms for developers and downstream users, facilitating early detection of regressions and edgeâ€‘case failures.
